DOC.brief_summary: The fetus may expose pregnancy nociceptive stimulus fetal pathology ( e.g. , malformation ) diagnostic therapeutic procedure . To date , little data consensus fetal analgesia . The aim investigator study evaluate pharmacokinetics Sufentanil intra amniotic injection .
DOC.brief_title: Sufentanil Pharmacokinetics After Intra Amniotic Injection
DOC.criteria: Termination pregnancy fetal malformation Gestational age > 24 week gestation Multiple pregnancy Allergy contraindication sufentanil Morphinic addiction fetal gastroschisis , omphalocele swallow disorder maternal cardiac respiratory distress
